strength_details: Clear role focused on SFTP data engineering
concern_details: Immediate start date and on-call duties suggest potential for long hours
US work authorization required - no visa sponsorship
No explicit mention of growth opportunities
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3-5 years of experience
Individuals with a focus on data pipeline development
probe_details: Understand typical work hours and workload
Inquire about the size and structure of the data engineering team
leverage_details: Experience with GoAnywhere and WinSCP is valuable
summary.overall_assessment: This is a solid mid-level data engineering role focused on SFTP data integration with a clear scope and transparent salary. The main trade-offs are the potential for overtime and the lack of visa sponsorship. It's a good fit for engineers with Azure experience and a focus on data pipelines.
